ovdesc.p: FD.STANDARD.PERIODS is used to define, by tenor in number of days (upper limit), the standard periods. This file is then used, when renewing a deposit within the group, to define the maturity date and to automatically allocate an interest rate.

desc.p: The key is an unique identifier to the FD.STANDARD.PERIODS
The key must be a valid company code defined in COMPANY

t.desc:
Defines the tenor for the corresoponding range of days

= number of

Specifies the upper limit in number of days for the definition of the tenor
